document_data.name: Peranox
document_data.text: "Yes, a human poison." Olive nodded as beads of perspiration began rising on her forehead and cheeks. "And a [[halfling]] poison as well. Fast-acting. Deadly. What I have here will kill me. It may kill you, too. Though of course, I don't know the correct dosage for a beast your size."
document_data.source: Olive Ruskettle to Mistinarperadnacles Hai Draco
document_data.mainbody: In [[1357 DR]],  the Fire Knives attacked Alias while trying to bring her in alive. Afterward, vials of peranox were looted from their bodies, giving her an important clue about the assassins' true intent. The same bottles later found their way into [[halfling]] [[bard]] [[Olive Ruskettle]]'s pockets and gave her an important upper hand in negotiating with the famous [[red dragon]] [[Mistinarperadnacles Hai Draco]]. Olive threatened to drink the cinnamon-smelling poison before the dragon was to eat her, which would kill the dragon as a result. Eventually, Olive threw the poison bottle into Mist's maw, almost killing the dragon. But Mist's life was saved by a [[saurial]] [[paladin]] [[Dragonbait]]'s healing.
document_data.Description: Peranox had a distinct potent [[cinnamon]] smell. It was usually kept in small vials sealed with [[sealing wax|wax]].

In [[1357 DR]],  the Fire Knives attacked Alias while trying to bring her in alive. Afterward, vials of peranox were looted from their bodies, giving her an important clue about the assassins' true intent. The same bottles later found their way into [[halfling]] [[bard]] [[Olive Ruskettle]]'s pockets and gave her an important upper hand in negotiating with the famous [[red dragon]] [[Mistinarperadnacles Hai Draco]]. Olive threatened to drink the cinnamon-smelling poison before the dragon was to eat her, which would kill the dragon as a result. Eventually, Olive threw the poison bottle into Mist's maw, almost killing the dragon. But Mist's life was saved by a [[saurial]] [[paladin]] [[Dragonbait]]'s healing.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* The Fire Knives used peranox to coat their blades with.
* [[Alias]] of [[Westgate]] recovered two bottles of peranox from the bodies of assassins that were sent after her.
* Olive Ruskettle eventually came to use one of Alias' bottles against Mist, a red dragon.
